Flow.description: 20250707 - Updated Create Task S00 to Create Task P35 DS Version: updated task for Case Accepted/Controverted v14- 2404-70424 - WC Attorney Task Queue: Initial Client Call

formulas.name: f_date_SOL_CR
formulas.expression: CASE( TEXT({!$Record.SOL_Based_On__c}), "1 Year 90 days from Dismissal", DATE( YEAR({!$Record.Date_of_Dismissal__c}) + 1, MONTH({!$Record.Date_of_Dismissal__c}), DAY({!$Record.Date_of_Dismissal__c}) ) + 90, "1 Year 90 days from Arrest", DATE( YEAR({!$Record.litify_pm__Incident_date__c}) + 1, MONTH({!$Record.litify_pm__Incident_date__c}), DAY({!$Record.litify_pm__Incident_date__c}) ) + 90, "3 Years from Arrest", DATE( YEAR({!$Record.litify_pm__Incident_date__c}) + 3, MONTH({!$Record.litify_pm__Incident_date__c}), DAY({!$Record.litify_pm__Incident_date__c}) ), "3 Years from Dismissal", DATE( YEAR({!$Record.Date_of_Dismissal__c}) + 3, MONTH({!$Record.Date_of_Dismissal__c}), DAY({!$Record.Date_of_Dismissal__c}) ), NULL )

Flow.label: Matter: after create/update
